title: Ron Brownstein: "Rock Me On The Water"
description: Michael sits down with Atlantic Senior Editor Ron Brownstein, author of "Rock Me on the Water: 1974-The Year Los Angeles Transformed Movies, Music, Television, and Politics." Original air date 23 March 2021. The book was published on 23 March 2021.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Ron Brownstein)
